name: General Tivian Application Prerequisites
title: General Tivian Application Prerequisites
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1147797513 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Tivian Access uses Okta and is advertised with enhanced security. Thus every application has to use HTTPS. Tivian Access should not be enabled without HTTPS.
